1071480.name: Newfound Courage - Soundtrack
1071480.description:
The original soundtrack of Newfound Courage and Winter's Fair, by award-winning composer Jessica Kelly featuring all 17 of the game and DLC's much loved musical compositions including Just Like me and Home.

Full tracklist:

  • Home
  • Some Other
  • The Vault
  • Sendings Eat Flowers
  • Legal Drinking Age
  • Dread
  • Lament
  • Waking up in Silverpine
  • This Elation
  • A Dead World
  • Closure
  • The Worst Memory
  • Resolutions
  • Hope
  • Just Like Me
  • Winter's Fair
  • Missed Connections

Songs will be downloaded to The Music of Newfound Courage folder in your Steam Directory:
[…]\Steam\steamapps\common\Newfound Courage\The Music of Newfound Courage
1071480.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
